name: Gravity (itch) (Dinonaut Games)
description:
Traverse across the stars in your own rocket ship! Ensure victory by dodging planets, asteroids, blackholes and more, but be careful not to run out of fuel.

Game Features
In game tutorials to show you the ropes!
Collect stars by completing levels quickly, gather enough to unlock more levels.
Record your times and try for personal bests.
In depth options to customize your experience.
Easy to play and even easier to pick up where you left off.
